attributes.action: Close down the dating site Secondwife.com in the Uk Bigamy is illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Bigamy
ˈbɪɡəmi/
noun
noun: bigamy
the offence of marrying someone while already married to another person.
attributes.background: To promote more than one marriage in the Uk is detrimental to our family values and goes against the sacred bond of marriage as we see it. It is also a punishable offence in our Uk court of law so therefore should not be allowed

rejection.details: The Government doesn't have the power to shut down websites in this way.
